Ingredient Source: Ingredient 7: Salt and black pepper to taste  Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F  Cut tops off bell peppers, remove seeds and membranes, arrange in a baking dish  In a skillet, cook sausage until browned and crumbled  Drain excess fat  Mix in rice, 1/4 cup parmesan, and 1/2 cup marinara  Spoon mixture into peppers, top with marinara and mozzarella  Sprinkle with remaining parmesan, bake for 30 minutes  Season with salt and pepper to taste  Difficulty: Moderate Prep Tools: Measuring cups, measuring spoons, skillet, mixing bowl, baking dish, chopping board Ingredient Source: Grocery Store</s>

Ingredient 7: 1 cup grated parmesan cheese Ingredient 8: Salt and black pepper to taste Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F  Slice eggplants into 1/4-inch thick rounds  In separate bowls, place flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs  Coat eggplant slices in flour, dip in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs  Heat oil in a skillet, fry eggplant slices until golden  Layer fried eggplant slices in a baking dish with marinara, mozzarella, and parmesan  Bake for 30 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly  Season with salt and pepper to taste  Difficulty: Moderate Prep Tools: Measuring cups, measuring spoons, mixing bowls, chopping board, skillet, baking dish, cooling rack Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Ingredient 7: 1 cup grated parmesan cheese Ingredient 8: Salt and black pepper to taste Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F  Pound chicken breasts to an even thickness  In separate bowls, place flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs  Coat chicken breasts in flour, dip in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs  Heat oil in a skillet, brown chicken on both sides  Place chicken in a baking dish, top with marinara, mozzarella, and parmesan  Bake for 20-25 minutes, until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted  Season with salt and pepper to taste  Difficulty: Moderate Prep Tools: Measuring cups, measuring spoons, mixing bowls, skillet, baking dish, meat mallet Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Instructions: Ingredient 4: 2 cups strong brewed coffee, cooled
Ingredient Source: Ingredient 7: 1/2 cup grated dark chocolate Instructions: In a bowl, beat egg yolks and sugar until pale  Stir in mascarpone until smooth  Combine coffee and coffee liqueur  Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture and arrange in a single layer in a dish  Spread half of mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers, sprinkle with chocolate  Repeat layers, cover with plastic wrap, refrigerate for at least 3 hours  Difficulty: Moderate Prep Tools: Mixing bowls, electric mixer, measuring cups, measuring spoons, spatula, 9x13-inch baking dish Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Ingredient Source: Ingredient 7: 1 can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed Ingredient 8: 1 can diced tomatoes Ingredient 9: 1 quart vegetable broth Ingredient 10: 2 cups chopped fresh spinach Ingredient 11: Salt and black pepper to taste Instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat  Add onion, carrots, and celery, cook until tender  Stir in garlic, cook for 1 minute  Add both beans, diced tomatoes, and vegetable broth Bring to a boil, stir in spinach, reduce heat, and simmer  Season with salt and pepper to taste  Difficulty: Easy Prep Tools: Cutting board, knife, large pot, measuring cups, measuring spoons Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Ingredient 2: Ingredient 2: 1 cup pancetta or guanciale, cubed or sliced
Difficulty: Ingredient 5: Salt and black pepper to taste

Ingredient Source: In a skillet, cook pancetta or guanciale until crisp  Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of the fat  In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, salt, and black pepper  Drain cooked spaghetti, reserving pasta water  Add pasta to the skillet with pancetta/guanciale, stir in egg mixture until creamy  If needed, add reserved pasta water  Difficulty: Easy Prep Tools: Measuring cups, measuring spoons, large pot, skillet, mixing bowl Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Ingredient Source: Ingredient 7: 15 oz can diced tomatoes Ingredient 8: 1 quart chicken or vegetable broth Ingredient 9: 8 oz ditalini or elbow macaroni Ingredient 10: 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley Ingredient 11: Salt and black pepper to taste Instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat  Add onion, carrots, and celery, cook until tender  Stir in garlic, cook for 1 minute  Add beans, diced tomatoes, and broth  Bring to a boil, adding pasta  Reduce heat, and simmer until pasta is tender  Season with salt and black pepper to taste, top with parsley  Difficulty: Easy Prep Tools: Cutting board, knife, large pot, measuring cups, measuring spoons Ingredient Source: Grocery Store

Ingredient 3: Ingredient 3: Salt and black pepper to taste
Ingredient Source: Ingredient 7: 1 cup chicken stock Ingredient 8: 2 sprigs of fresh rosemary Instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper  Dredge in flour and shake off excess  Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet, cook chicken until golden, remove  In the same skillet, add remaining butter and mushrooms, cook until browned  Stir in wine, boil and reduce liquid by half  Add chicken stock and rosemary, simmer, return chicken to the skillet, spoon sauce over chicken  Difficulty: Moderate Prep Tools: Measuring cups, measuring spoons, mixing bowls, skillet Ingredient Source: Grocery Store</s>
